name: Cauldron of Boiling Oil
description: A large iron cauldron of boiling oil mounted on a wall or battlement. It can be tipped to pour its contents onto creatures below. Each creature in a 10-foot-square area directly below must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) Fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Once used, the cauldron must be refilled and reheated (10 minutes).
